enhanced_by.reason: The shutDown method resets the state of the discoverer, ensuring that any previous state is cleared before starting again.
The checkStarted method ensures that the discoverer is in the correct state before proceeding with the discovery process, which is crucial before starting.

The determineAddress method relies on the discoverer being in an operational state, which is set up by the start method. Therefore, assertions about the state and functionality of determineAddress can be informed by the start method's execution.
The doTestI method is part of the discovery process that follows the start method. Assertions about the success of doTestI can be informed by the proper setup of the start method.
